definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the abnormal imagine of postoperative T-tube retrograde cholangiography for clinical practive.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨术后经T形管胆道造影异常影像的临床意义。

sentences.english: This disease was often agnostic and misdiagnosed biliary ascariasis in the past.
sentences.chinese: 过去对本病缺乏认识，常误诊为胆道蛔虫病。

sentences.english: In children, the most common reason for liver transplantation is biliary atresia .
sentences.chinese: 在儿童肝脏移植最常见的原因是胆道闭锁。

sentences.english: To evaluate the feasibility of applying choledochofiberoscope in less-invasive operation for biliary diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨应用纤维胆道镜施行低创胆道手术的可行性。

sentences.english: To evaluate the feasibility of applying choledochofiberoscope in less-invasive operation for biliary diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨应用纤维胆道镜施行低创胆道手术的可行性。

sentences.english: Results PTBD was successfully performed in all the patients.
sentences.chinese: 结果全部病人经皮经肝穿刺胆道引流手术成功。

sentences.english: Objective The clinical value of peroral biliary mother babyscope was verified.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结经口胆道子母镜的临床应用价值。

sentences.english: Objective: To explore the applied value of ureterorenoscopy in cholelithiasis surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨输尿管肾镜在胆道结石外科的应用价值。

sentences.english: Objectives To investigate the effect of the treatment of biliary ascarid with duodenoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨十二指肠镜治疗胆道蛔虫病的效果。

sentences.english: To observe clinical efficacy of Lidan capsule(LDC)in treating acute infection of biliary tract.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察利胆胶囊治疗急性胆道感染的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Cholangiography should probably be performed routinely during cholecystectomy.
sentences.chinese: 胆道造影或许应该进行例行胆囊切除术中。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the values of ERCP in surgical therapy of biliary tracts .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨ERCP在胆道外科治疗中的应用价值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the character and treatment of clonorchiasis sinensis combined with cholangitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨华支睾吸虫病并胆道感染的特点与治疗。

sentences.english: Bile is introduced into the duodenum by the bile duct.
sentences.chinese: 胆汁是通过胆道进入十二指肠的。

sentences.english: He received operations of segmental jejunum resection and cholecystoduedenal fistula closure sucuerrfully.
sentences.chinese: 病人并且接受切肠手术和胆道廔管缝合手术。

sentences.english: The micro-injured techniques of biliary surgery include endoscopy and laparoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 胆道外科的微创技术包括内镜和腹腔镜技术。

definition: jejunum (empty gut, middle segment of small intestine between duodenum 十二指腸|十二指肠[shi2 er4 zhi3 chang2] and ileum 回腸|回肠[hui2 chang2])
sigmoid colon (anatomy)/bent colon, linking the descending colon to the rectum
